title.narrative: Xinjiang Yining Urban Transport Improvement Project

description.narrative: The Project Development Objective (PDO) is to improve transport mobility in the central area of Yining City and to provide transport accessibility in the selected new areas of the city, all in a safe, clean and efficient manner.

title.narrative: Intermediate Result indicator One: Number of technical studies completed
Intermediate Result indicator One: Number of public transport infrastructure built
Intermediate Result indicator Two: Number of officials and technical staff trained
Intermediate Result indicator Two: Number of buses procured
Intermediate Result indicator One: Number of upgraded and newly-installed signalized junctions
Intermediate Result indicator Two: Kilometers of corridors improved for traffic management and road safety
Intermediate Result indicator Two: Number of E-Police cameras installed
Intermediate Result indicator Three: Number of road maintenance vehicles procured
Intermediate Result indicator One: Kilometers of existing urban roads improved
Increased population with access to quality urban transport services in the selected new development areas
Intermediate Result indicator Two: Kilometers of new urban roads constructed
Intermediate Result (Component One): Urban Road Improvement and Construction
Reduce Average morning peak-hour travel times in two integrated corridors-Jiefang Rd
Reduced average annual number of fatalities per 10,000 mototrized vehicles within the urban area over a three-year period
Reduced average morning peak-hour travel times in two integrated corridors-Ahemaitijiang Road
Increased annual public transport ridership in the urban area.
Intermediate Result (Component Four): Institutional Capacity Development
Intermediate Result (Component Three): Traffic Management and Road Safety
Intermediate Result (Component Two): Public Transport Infrastructure and Equipment
